participant_2.background:

my mother is in the hospital.
my dog s name is wonwon.

content.text: I'm so sorry to hear about your mother. I hope she recovers quickly.
Thank you, that's kind of you.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like watching Star Trek and hanging out with my dog, Wonwon.
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I think it could be fun. My mom used to take me to see them when I was a kid.
I've never been to one either, but I've always been curious.
I'm a lifelong learner who loves to devour books and explore new things. I also enjoy building computers and welding.
That's really cool! I'm not much of a builder, but I love to read.
I love to read too! I'm always looking for new books to read.
What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book called "The Martian" by Andy Weir. It's a really good book about a guy who gets stranded on Mars.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out
